# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : role_filter.py

@Time        : 2022/3/3 5:56 下午
@Description :

from django_filters import rest_framework as filters

from client.models.role import Role



[文档]class RoleFilter(filters.FilterSet):

    disable = filters.CharFilter(method="filter_disable")
    role_name = filters.CharFilter(field_name="name", lookup_expr='contains')


[文档]    def filter_disable(self, querset, name, value):
        """"过滤角色状态"""
        value = True if value == "true" else False
        return querset.filter(disable=value)



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = Role
        fields = ["is_deleted", "role_name"]
